website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced 2-in-1 model capable of moderate video and photo editing.
pros: One of the most affordable models that can handle video and photo editing, the Inspiron 14 stands out for its sleek 2-in-1 design
Features a 10th-generation Intel i5 processor, UHD graphics, 8GB RAM and a 256GB SSD

customer_reviews.title: Intentionally wrong specifications
customer_reviews.text: It is a scam, they have double descripción on the Item, basically in the title describes better specifications then when you receives the laptop noticed lower monitor diez, RAM and SSD charasteristics. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IF YOU NEED ANYTHING OTHER THAN MICROSOFT APPS
customer_reviews.text: Does not allow for you to download or run other programs other than Microsofts store products without spending more money to "upgrade" you system. Very misleading and ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this... It's hoax
customer_reviews.text: This is a hoax, the specifications of the laptop delivered are different. I bought the one that shows the page: DELL INTEL CORE i3 7th Gen., 15.6", 256 GB SSD and 8 GB RAM, but delivery a laptop INTEL CORE i3 5th Gen., 14", 128 GB SSD and 4 GB RAM. You pay the value of advertising, but for a laptop with lower features.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge George

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell but don't like having to switch modes
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice so far but initially only Microsoft products are permitted to be downloaded. You have to switch to windows 10 to sign out of s mode. This is too complicated although I did it.
customer_reviews.author: S. mills

customer_reviews.title: Terrible viewing angles.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is terrible. It is a TN display not an IPS. There is a very small viewing angle. Tilt it slightly away and the screen gets dark and poor color representation, tilt it slightly toward you and the screen washes out bad. I would not have bought this if I saw it first. You need to stay directly in front of the screen for it to look ok. Even at its best its not great, or even good.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth m kasper

customer_reviews.title: Awful display .... Very upset
customer_reviews.text: Really upset the display on this laptop is awful . I love the computer it's pretty fast and the sound is awesome. But, as you can see in the video you can't see the display well unless you are looking at the screen straight on, and even then if you move even the slightest display will fade . I've spent hours trying different graphics settings, the graphics are Intel UHD and the UHD settings are not there . I've concluded that it's the monitor I'm going to complain to Dell if I get no response from them I'll be returning to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RickW

customer_reviews.title: Not to throw it due to the guys voice
customer_reviews.text: Trying to set it up the guys voice is clearly judgemental and mocking you ,and you suffer due to inadequacy. Giving you the phrase"that in not correct try again" I. Hear the guy say your a putz and I feel small
customer_reviews.author: Perrigoat

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quality build, sturdy, light and upgradeable - xtra RAM & SSD slots
customer_reviews.text: Amazing 2-in-1. Came with 1 x 8Gb memory and I’m going to add another 1 x 16Gb - so I’ll have 24Gb. And, I added a second SSD hard drive. The 500 Gb drive it comes w is the super fast PCIE SSD - which was a bonus. Feels very sturdy but not heavy. Best laptop I’ve owned since buying a new MacBook Pro back in ‘09. I expect this will last me for many years.
customer_reviews.author: WSOgator

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Must return.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Sending it back. It will not allow my student to get on her network at school. All a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10S not Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon website lists the device as having Windows 10, but the unit that was delivered had Windows 10S. I immediately returned the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Randy N.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Size and specifications are great for most applications. 8gb of ram with a 512gb SSD are very adequate. 14" size just fits the backpack or brief case much better than the 15.6". Dell still offers a quality machine and good customer service. I can only hope than Windows 10 improves. I still find the Windows Laptop is not equal to my Macbook but for me, some things are better in Windows. I hope than Dell and Apple continue to improve their machines.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Comes with Windows 10 in S Mode
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a 2-in-1 laptop from a reliable company, Dell. It does come with Microsoft 10 in S Mode but you can easily take it out of S mode to be able to download products/apps outside of Microsoft Edge/Microsoft Store. Not a lot of memory, but I have an external drive anyway for all my important documents.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop considering it's price, features and size. Touchscreen/2-in-1 feature works great. I have been using Dell laptops for work for the past 5 years and they never disappoint! Only downside is that this version is a little heavier than my previous one so I wouldn't recommend if you plan on mostly using and carrying it as an "ipad". Other than that i highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. My previous laptop is about 5 years old and is lightyears behind this one. This is faster and easier to use. I love the flexibility of using it as a tablet or laptop as needed. The touchscreen works well. My only complaint is that the speakers aren't quite loud enough. It's not a significant problem though, and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This device is really horrible. It's nice in terms of being relatively small and lightweight but as soon as you open it it's a terrible experience. First of all windows isn't genuine and I have to buy Windows. I can't even download Chrome because Windows is not genuine and I need to switch out of s mode. I can't switch out of s mode unless I buy Windows. Also sometimes computer doesn't turn on and you have to close the lid a few times and hit the power button a few times for it to turn on. It's unusable unless you buy Windows. I bought many pieces before I never had to then buy Windows license on top.
customer_reviews.author: Taige Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good, up-to-date laptop
customer_reviews.text: I don't replace computers very often, so I want the latest processor, fastest storage, etc. so I am not behind too quickly. This is a just-released machine with the tenth-generation processor and SSD drive. I am very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: HShotwell

customer_reviews.title: decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought on prime day for the wife, she loves it but only uses it for medial tasks, it would not stand up to my day to day requirements but for simple things and portable entertainment it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Kalel513

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop/tablet
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes, I was up and running. Great little laptop - and the Black Friday price was a steal. Very happy. Touch screen, tablet mode and laptop all work as expected. Yes, Windows 10S was not sufficient for me (I’m a Google power-user) so I turned off S mode - it was free for me - once I logged into my Microsoft Account. I do miss a back lit keyboard. And I’d love a stylus..... but over all, a good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: Dell needs to make it worth the money and fix lot of problems
customer_reviews.text: At first it was ok but after using it for a week I was starting to have problems. I was getting stuck all the time. I wasn't even able to open the web browser. I didn't have any apps install on the laptop but it was working like it had thousands of apps install and slow.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad subhani

customer_reviews.title: 2-in 1 one works great  does not feel  cheap
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I did end up turning s mode off. It’s free to do that , but only if you own a Microsoft key. If you don’t you have to pay To upgrade. Research windows 10 s mode so you know what you’re in for. ( lock down to only Microsoft browser & App Store.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a touchscreen laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought for $350. Powers up quickly. I like SD drives they are so fast. Didn’t really need that much memory so great for my needs. It’s a little bit thicker than the 14 inch Lenovo touchscreen that I have but weighs about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie624

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Product Does NOT Deliver
customer_reviews.text: Set up was incredibly challenging and never completed properly so the computer says. The Dell customer support couldn't even help after lengthy phone calls and emails. Pictures never fully upload. Constantly kicked off the internet and then when I try to fix the "problem" it says I am actually on the internet. None of our other computers have any of these issues. Every program seems to have some challenge and possibly due to the incomplete set up. Really disappointed again with Dell. I bought the computer to help me work from home more expediently and this has been the opposite experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Spam Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good cost-benefit, excelent product. Delay to find the number for active the operational system, but I had all support.
customer_reviews.author: BRUNO

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was a Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: Looked at same make and model number at another store and ordered this one at almost a $100 savings only to find out is has Windows 10. But works very well and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tfdofficer

customer_reviews.title: Good except for undependable touchpad
customer_reviews.text: This is fine if you only need a laptop occasionally; and worth the price. But it has one really frustrating quirk -- the touchpad can be either too sensitive or not sensitive enough, and I haven't figured out any pattern. Sometimes it responds when my finger is only hovering above it; at other times it responds slowly and several taps aren't enough. It's been a while since I've used a touchpad, so some of this may be me, but I've noticed a similar problem with the Enter key when clearing out emails. Otherwise, it functions well for a laptop of its memory size. and features. I'm going to look for a mouse, though.
customer_reviews.author: schar

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good value but we cannot get the audio input to work consistently . Went to Bluetooth. Speakers are terrible. Get good headphones or a Bluetooth speaker. Already had these. Fast loading, good touch screen and decent battery life. One star off for sub par audio.
customer_reviews.author: Rickus22

customer_reviews.title: Crappy return policy
customer_reviews.text: The windows s model wont let you download any programs. And if you want to return it you are going to pay for it and not get shipping charges refunded Pat Perry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with a non activated version of Windows 10S that was locked because it was counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This is complete crap. Computer is locked up with this crappy windows 10s that says it is counterfeit. It will not allow me to unlock it since Dell installed Counterfeit Microsoft windows 10 on my computer. Buyer Beware! Do not buy this computer. I am a A+ certified technician and this is ridiculous! Complete crap do not buy! Also the computer will not recognize the charger so the battery will not charge. Will be returning this asap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience ever! First Amazon sells me bundled Microsoft Office which had already expired when they sold it to me, then the computer was supposed to be loaded with Windows 10. Now it’s asking for a product key which I wasn’t supplied with. Never ever again!
customer_reviews.author: GMcJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have mostly used work laptops. For a personal laptop I can't think of anything better.
customer_reviews.author: JAH-Just a Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Dell Inspiron Is Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Dell makes fine products but there are some features that work best in my experience because the Inspiron is more comfortable than any of Dell’s other products; this model is inexpensive yet all the features work as easily as a more expensive model; as technology advances there are many new challenges and it takes time and patience to learn ... a new ending task for non professionals!
customer_reviews.author: MeriBrite

customer_reviews.title: For the price a steal
customer_reviews.text: The speakers suck, it has this blue glare at certain angles when watching a video or movie, which causes you to put yourself directly in front of it. It’s a small inconvenience that you adapt too. Other than those things it’s been everything I thought it would be. So Probably 3/5 for me but when you consider the price & other features it’s still worth it. Also, if you have previous Microsoft account it’s rather simple to remove S mode.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Caruthers

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working!
customer_reviews.text: Was working on this and it bleeped and then a blue screen...Won't work at all now. I've only had is just over 30 days...very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I was shocked how much I loved this 2in1 laptop
customer_reviews.text: This little 2in1 got some power .. okay so this dell wasn’t my first choice in a laptop for back to school ... but it popped up when I searched for 2in1 and I couldn’t believe the price .. Im soo attached to it now I take it to school and work ..
customer_reviews.author: Zoldyck heiress

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy my laptop from Amazon. It’s been a little over two months and my laptop is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Ignore naysayers
customer_reviews.text: Glad I decided to get this. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: imannie

customer_reviews.title: Computer
customer_reviews.text: Brought two both died three days after purchase. I spoke talk with an employee of Amazon she couldn't even find my account and then thought she would just not fix it so I was going to send back but the second computer a couple of days after this it did the same thing. Call the amazon tech service Robbie he knew enough about the computer and we had it fixed within minutes no refund or returns yay but still no paperwork on the protection plan
customer_reviews.author: lost.

customer_reviews.title: No Charger with it
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of money on this product. I think that it is ridiculous that I didn't get a charger or a booklet that came with this product. It's difficult for a college student to afford things let alone a laptop. The least they could have done was given a charger with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Baca

customer_reviews.title: really not a good piece
customer_reviews.text: recently bought, having an issue with volume not working and computer freezing up
customer_reviews.author: johanson

customer_reviews.title: Great economic choice for a grab and go solid work horse
customer_reviews.text: Great worksite computer. Light weight and solid yet fast and dependable
customer_reviews.author: Bboyd

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It brought Windows 10 S mode, it doesnt allow download apps o programs that dont appears in Microsoft Store. For example you cant download Google Chrome, at least you buy another Windows for 140bucks...so...
customer_reviews.author: CHOPPY

customer_reviews.title: Need to activate windows 10 license.
customer_reviews.text: You can activate windows 10 license through buying a windows 10 code from ebay from microsoft resellers for about $3-5. Follow the steps in the picture and it should work for you. WARNING: I am not responsible for anything that happens to your laptop. I am just sharing my experience. Overall laptop seems fine, but amazon should say that they are shipping a non activated windows laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: I have the 13 inch version, and it is the exact same size as the 14, except the bezel is thinner, so they fit a 14 inch screen on a 13 inch computer. Super fast, efficient, beautiful and long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Leite

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: The price and functionality of this laptop is hard to beat for my purpose. Interface is clean, has all the modern connections and battery life is real good. Keyboard is a little lacking but it is a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Just follow the directions to get s mode off of it for free. Don't care for the tablet mode when it is flipped over. But that is a Microsoft problem. Good bang for the buck 👍
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Basic Use
customer_reviews.text: This was a good value. I bought it for my daughter for basic use. She can use it for school and play Roblox and Minecraft on it. She is happy with it and so am I. It’s fast and the touch screen is fun to use. Feels durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for its advertised light weight - 2.87 lbs. Actual product turns out to be nearly 4 lbs!
customer_reviews.author: BHF

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. Unfortunately I haved worked all week, spent numbers of hours on the phone with Dell and Microsoft because Windows won't activate on this device. This item was not worth the cost considering what I have went through to make it operate properly without success.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom for Christmas and she loves it. I bought one earlier this year and cant say enough good things about it. Easy to manage, quick boot up, touchscreen and keyboard work well, nothing but net here. Made for an easy transition from Windows 7 to Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H.

customer_reviews.title: SUPPOSED TO HAVE ONE YEAR WARRANTY...NOT AVAILABLE WHEN TRYING TO GET REPAIR UNDER WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: Used well for about 5 months. Plugged in and it shuts off and cannot connect. Cannot get any warranty information from Amazon for this Dell computer. Dell knows nothing. Next time I will go straight to Dell for my purchase since Amazon cannot back up the warranty. Very dissatisfied. I have tried to find where to send for service since mid April with no help. Today I try again and it says Product Support Closed on May 6, 2020. How very convenient. Isn't this supposed to have a year warranty??
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Restelli

customer_reviews.title: Inspiron Computer
customer_reviews.text: I like the case. Every once in a while the screen turns upside down. Also the sound goes away and I have to reboot the computer. In my opinion not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: maru

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Been a great laptop! We have been using it for a couple months now with zero issues. Works great for bills and homeschooled kids
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: Would not operate to open to the internet. Need to wipe it and reinstall so that it will work. If you know how to do this great, if not I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: Windows
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking at all the people saying you have to spend a lot more money for the better windows 10... it is true but also not true. Yes you have to buy windows 10 but there are websites that sell codes for $14 and it’s sooooo worth it with how good the laptop is afterwards. So consider it 364 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. I use it very often, it's very fast, perfect for watching movies, making notes, typing documents, internet. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Scammon

customer_reviews.title: Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to do much on it yet, but I’m learning. Touchscreen is a great feature. It’s fast and does what I need it to as far as filling out forms, resumes, etc. Fast web surfing. It connects to my phone for some things. I took a long time picking a lap top, but this exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: exgirlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a friend he has Rheumatoid Arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend he has Rheumatoid Arthritis. Touch screen is wonderful and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Don Christensen

customer_reviews.title: No good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overprices with yesterdays tech - look elsewhere for much better laptops at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop but Bad Audio
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop for a small business or student. No happy at all with the speakers sound. I had a HP and the sound was amazing. I bought the computer on January 2020, and I wait to provide a review.
customer_reviews.author: Ecowaii

customer_reviews.title: Very snappy
customer_reviews.text: Solid upper midrange 2 in 1 laptop with the power and ssd excellent battery life, laptop is snappy. My only concern are the hinges switching between tablet mode to laptop, only time will tell with wear. My only con would be why no ethernet port you had enough space to put an hdmi out port but not an ethernet port? found that puzzling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: First Computer I Kept after ordering through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Functions great but cant find a case to fit it so that I can use it as a tablet and switch over to a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop/ tablet..comes with windiws 10 S which allows only microsoft appl. but u can disable it to switch to windows 10 and install non microsoft app. Touch screen is a plus..great laptop for normal work just not for gamung. with the price it comes with am Very satisfied...
customer_reviews.author: Amed

customer_reviews.title: Good!!
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact, compared to what I’m used too. Quick and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Engbarth

customer_reviews.title: only has windows 10 in S mode!
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great little computer but the windows is locked in s mode. This means you can only use bing and cannot download anything that is no from the microsoft store or microsoft authenticated. Totally usless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L. Guernsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Power and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable speed and versatility. The setup was very easy. Up and running in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Loren F

customer_reviews.title: wrong laptop weight
customer_reviews.text: The laptop weight is not correctly stated. It was advertised as 2.87 lbs, but it is actually 3.87 lb. I purchased this laptop with specifically weight in mind as I wanted a light laptop, and I would have not bought this product if I have known it is 3.87 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Cho

customer_reviews.title: Excelent cost-benefit option
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price. Laptop is super light and the touch screen is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I like the crispness and clarity of videos. System is fast enough for my needs. Package arrived before my expected delivery. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dredz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop loaded Ubuntu on it. Perfect laptop for developers.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laptop to have especially if you’re a college student. Battery life is amazing and there’s a camera for your classes. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the negatives, Best Low Budget Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Ignore all the negative reviews written here regarding windows not being activated, S - mode etc. Everything works great. You can opt out of the S mode in a sec. No you don't hv to pay anything! I've personally been an HP user for a while now. But the quality and endurance of Dell laptops is superior to HP even in the low-mid range laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Shakeel Yousaf

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: First off... Its not the correct model i ordered. Windows was not activated initially but got activated after restart. It worked fine for just about a month and then died.
customer_reviews.author: Khadir Manjoor

customer_reviews.title: issues
customer_reviews.text: every time a video starts on yahoo or aol the screen flashes. turns off for no reason some times
customer_reviews.author: mid

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Easy to navigate. Touch screen works great. Lightweight and great size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Martin

customer_reviews.title: I love my laptop, good purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new lap top! And I love that it’s touch screen as well! It has a fast processor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: good for presentations not all apps apply
customer_reviews.text: It is good for what I need. No complaints. Dell products are usually good.
customer_reviews.author: Business Women

customer_reviews.title: Scam-- You cannot activate window as it has not a legal copy installed
customer_reviews.text: Guys be careful and do not buy this one, as you cannot activate the installed window 10 s mode. And product key is not provided. So you are using a fake copy if windows. The seller swindled me and a lot of other people by not describing this in product description. Don't buy this
customer_reviews.author: confirmed buyer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: First one received with a messed up screen. Had it replaced but never really used it much. Crashed randomly and can no longer boot up. Total usage over its lifetime was maybe 15 hours... not a very good computer.
customer_reviews.author: Joan G.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad! I expected better quality...
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt, programs were freezing, while only running 1 to 2 at a time. Device froze several times a day, and wouldn't wake from sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with how it arrived not sure if was the buyer or FedEx screw up but this is not acceptable. The half the screen is defective and is also missing a screw on the bottom, which makes me believe its was already returned and then was resold to me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brabham

customer_reviews.title: SCAM DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The specs and quality level are completely incorrect. Not nearly as much RAM or memory on the device as advertised. It's also very slow and buggy. Advertised as 'excellent condition' though
customer_reviews.author: Morgana

customer_reviews.title: Great for Highschool work
customer_reviews.text: Works great for Highschool work not too heavy which my sister love a
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Display is awful.
customer_reviews.text: A complete garbage. I'm at lost on how the display quality of such a "recognized" brand like Dell as fallen this low. Can't look at the images in other position than facing screen in a straight manner.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Molina

customer_reviews.title: LAP TOP KEYBOARD FAILED AFTER 7 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: LAP TOP KEYBOARD FAILED AFTER 7 MONTHS. CAN'T FIND ANY WAY TO GET THE WARRANTY ACCEPTED. LESS THAN ONE YEAR FOR A DELL. I BOUGHT IT FOR THE NAME AND SENT IT WITH MY DAUGHTER FOR COLLEGE. I WONDER WHY THEY DON'T HAVE A ONE YEAR WARRANTY???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was in perfect condition, delivered on time and I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is in college or needing it for school related stuff. Would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: After about a month this computer stopped working it would not turn on at all. I would hesitant to buy another. It would be a great computer if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good 2&1 laptop tablet
customer_reviews.text: Good computer so far and I’ve loved the 2&1 feature. It’s the whole reason I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor pranger

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I want to say thanks very we received the laptop and it working very good for now thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Window 10 Home S don't
customer_reviews.text: Comes with Windows 10 home S. The s is not a feature. It is a lot of restictions. Cost $140 dollars to upgrade to actual Home edition. Could have bout a better computer with home already in it for the price of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typing This From My Acer Aspire 5.
customer_reviews.text: All the cool features like touchscreen and fingerprint reader stopped working after 2 weeks. Took way too long to turn on and restart, and it deleted everything on its own one morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jonash Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: The product itself should be lighter.using it like a tablet it's not easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Elvy

customer_reviews.title: Wont let you download chrome. what a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Microsoft has forcibly not allowed owners of this computer to download other browsers, and force you to use your crappy microsoft edge or internet explorer. no thanks. What a joke. Do not buy.

customer_reviews.title: Dell Amazon On-line Products,
customer_reviews.text: System Battery Adapter and plug in on computor defected system doesn't taka a charge. Bio has hardware issues. Dell customer service was excellent however I had add extended warranty. Direct from Dell.

customer_reviews.title: Average expectation
customer_reviews.text: Battery life wasn't as expected. I had to upgrade with an additional 4gb ram to speed it up.

customer_reviews.title: Two things!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except that the microphone is not working and sometimes when I turn it on and the laptop is charging, a big letter appears saying that the charger is not working

customer_reviews.title: The work of the computer
customer_reviews.text: I like the computer, however, the warranty was not in the box and I am requesting for my warranty. Also, there are problems with the computer that I am trying to figure out.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: This touchscreen laptop by Dell has exceeded my expectations and was easy to setup. It is quick when going from tab to tab and the sound quality is amazing.
